name: Ambrosia (itch) (youis11, Marc Gálvez)
description:
Ambrosia is a singleplayer runner where you need to pay attention at the two vikings that you will control the same time. Overcome the obstacles in order to climb up to the summit of the mountain and get the elixir of immortality!

CONTROLS: 

  • "A"  "D" movement Male Viking
  • "Left" Right" movement Female Viking

COLLABORATORS:

  • Respawn mechanic
  • Ragdoll
